item.description: The South End awakens your senses with its blocks of Victorian brick row houses, upscale restaurants, specialty food purveyors, and art galleries.  It is undeniably one of Boston’s most exciting places to be. You feel like you are in Paris where people take their cuisine seriously and food is elevated to a true art and intermingled in all fabrics of society. Come taste your way around Boston’s most delicious neighborhood as we discover hidden ethnic and gourmet markets and taste food from some of Boston’s most interesting and tasty chefs.
item.name: COMMON BOSTON - Gourmet Oasis: Walking Boston’s South End
